def DFS(G):

        u.color = white

    time = 0

    for each vertex u in G.V:
        if u.color == white:
            DFS_VISIT(G, u)

# ì¬ê·€ì  ë°©ë¬¸
def DFS_VISIT(G, u):
    global time
    time = time + 1
    u.d = time          # discovery time ê¸°ë¡
    u.color = gray

    for each v in G.Adj[u]:
        if v.color == white:
            v.Ï€ = u
            DFS_VISIT(G, v)

    u.color = black
    time = time + 1
    u.f = time          # finish time ê¸°ë¡

def topological_sort(G):
    result = []

    # DFS ìˆ˜í–‰

    return sorted(G.V, key=lambda v: v.f, reverse=True)

ë” íš¨ìœ¨ì ì¸ ë°©ë²•:

def DFS_VISIT_with_topological(G, u, result):
    global time
    time = time + 1
    u.d = time
    u.color = gray

    for each v in G.Adj[u]:
        if v.color == white:
            v.Ï€ = u
            DFS_VISIT_with_topological(G, v, result)

    u.color = black
    time = time + 1
    u.f = time
    result.insert(0, u)  # ì•ì— ì‚½ì… (finish time í° ê²ƒë¶€í„°)
